company_info.Company Description: About HungryBags.com* HungryBags.com is an AMBITIOUS & REVOLUTIONARY attempt at reshaping the online travel industryIt is a COMPLETE ONLINE TRAVEL SOLUTIONS portal which complements online prowess with a robust offline business
